io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction

Class TransferTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction.Transaction
      • io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction.TransferTransaction

  • public class TransferTransaction
extends Transaction
    The transfer transactions object contain data about transfers of mosaics and message to another account.
    Since:
    1.0

      • TransferTransaction

        public TransferTransaction(NetworkType networkType,
                           java.lang.Integer version,
                           TransactionDeadline deadline,
                           java.math.BigInteger maxFee,
                           java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> signature,
                           java.util.Optional<PublicAccount> signer,
                           java.util.Optional<TransactionInfo> transactionInfo,
                           Recipient recipient,
                           java.util.List<Mosaic> mosaics,
                           Message message)
        Parameters:
        networkType - network type
        version - transaction version. Use EntityVersion.TRANSFER for current version
        deadline - transaction deadline
        maxFee - transaction fee
        signature - optional signature
        signer - optional signer
        transactionInfo - optional transaction info
        recipient - transfer recipient
        mosaics - list of mosaic values that is to be transferred
        message - message

        protected int getPayloadSerializedSize()
